name: Arial Annihilator
description: Gets rid of Arial and replaces it with a better font, if you have one.

user.name: Chris D.
user.about: I write styles to suit my own personal pet peeves. Maybe you'll enjoy them.

additional_info: Windows may see Helvetica and Give you Arial instead, even if you have the fonts specified after it. To fix this, you need to modify the registry, which comes with its risks.
